elements.id: #SCN: Before all
elements.name: #SCN: Before all

steps.name: Before all Switch to App main window
Before all Wait for OpenFin runtime ready
Before all Verify OpenFin runtime version
Before all Check for existence of permissions file, if not create

elements.id: #SCN: Given a trader creating a formula priced trade When the trader creates a new formula component
elements.name: #SCN: Given a trader creating a formula priced trade When the trader creates a new formula component

steps.name:
Given a trader creating a formula priced trade 
    Then the correct fields appear and are marked as mandatory

      [COLDN-70424]

Given a trader creating a formula priced trade When the trader creates a new formula component 
      Then overall fields default based on the selected Price Quote

elements.id:
#SCN: Given a trader creating a trade
          And the create trade screen has loaded
          And the trader selects Trade Type = External Term  When Delivery Range = Monthly
elements.name:
#SCN: Given a trader creating a trade
          And the create trade screen has loaded
          And the trader selects Trade Type = External Term  When Delivery Range = Monthly

steps.name:
Given a trader creating a trade
          And the create trade screen has loaded
          And the trader selects Trade Type = External Term  
  [COLDN-37334]
  Then the required fields are displayed in the Summary panel

Given a trader creating a trade
          And the create trade screen has loaded
          And the trader selects Trade Type = External Term  
  [COLDN-41576]
  Then Delivery Range default value is empty

Given a trader creating a trade
          And the create trade screen has loaded
          And the trader selects Trade Type = External Term  When Delivery Range = Monthly 
      [COLDN-41576]
      Then the term trade panel should be displayed with the correct fields

Given a trader creating a trade
          And the create trade screen has loaded
          And the trader selects Trade Type = External Term  When Delivery Range = Monthly 
      [COLDN-41576]
      Then Start Month and End Month contain values like Mmm-YYYY

Given a trader creating a trade
          And the create trade screen has loaded
          And the trader selects Trade Type = External Term  When Delivery Range = Monthly 
      [COLDN-41576]
      Then End Month has to be after Start Month

Given a trader creating a trade
          And the create trade screen has loaded
          And the trader selects Trade Type = External Term  When Delivery Range = Monthly 
      [COLDN-71192]
      Then trade legs are calculated correctly

  they add a leg, deleting it immediately after the last leg cannot be cancelled

  AND
  they add a leg, deleting it immediately after when deleted, the added leg is removed from the grid
